title: Emergency intervention supporting WHO's activities for disabled persons and IED victims in Hudur, South West State, Somalia
description: Main objective of the intervention is supporting disabled people and victims of the frequent armed conflicts in the area, which was, till recently, under the control of Al Shabab. The planned emergency medical intervention will mainly focus on trauma and emergency care of IED victims at Hudur hospital, in the South West State, Somalia, in line with the UNMAS 5 Pillars of Mine Action.
